app-description: Sunrise is a specialized data availability layer for proof of liquidity, which enhances liquidity and sovereignty for developers.
sunrise-definition: Sunrise is the comprehensive solution to problems faced in modern blockchain development.

sunrise-01.label: Monolithic blockchains can't scale.
sunrise-01.description: A monolithic chain is a generalist blockchain that performs all tasks. Overall, the monolithic approach is to “do everything yourself”. However, this approach is expensive, not customizable, and not scalable. It's extremely slow to build and deploy modern applications directly on monolithic chains. It's an outdated formula, ready for disruption.

sunrise-02.label: The modular paradigm is already here.
sunrise-02.description: A modular blockchain differs from a monolithic chain in that its four main functions can each be offloaded to a separate layer. Sunrise is an example of a blockchain that specializes in fulfilling the function of data availability (“DA”) and consensus, while offloading the responsibility of execution and settlement to a different network. By using this structure, Modular Blockchains are more efficient, customizable, scalable, sovereign...

sunrise-03.label: What will you build in a modular future?
sunrise-03.description: Sunrise provides a fast and secure data and consensus layer that gives you all you need to launch a sustainable modular blockchain. With Sunrise, your chain can become scalable and sovereign, giving you the freedom to build your chain anyway you want. Sunrise's DA layer supports any execution environment, empowering you to create next-gen blockchain solutions.

sunrise-04.label: The unique value of Sunrise
sunrise-04.description: Sunrise brings further innovation to the modular paradigm by introducing unique functionality for AltDA: Any Token for Fees, and Sovereign Proof of Liquidity. Sunrise resolves singular token dependency by allowing users of its DA layer to pay for gas fees with “any token”. Tokens received by Sunrise are locked in long term, preventing selling pressure against fees received and earning yield for Sunrise stakers. Sunrise also resolves the liquidity issue faced by sovereign rollups by enabling “Proof of Liquidity”, which incentivizes governance participants and liquidity providers. Pairing the Sunrise token with the sovereign rollup’s native token creates a mutual feedback loop that simultaneously enhances liquidity and security for both the Sunrise DA layer and any rollup deployed onto it. Together, these unique functions supercharge Data Availability while enhancing liquidity and sovereignty for developers.

sunrise-features.label: Build better blockchains, more easily and efficiency then ever before.
sunrise-features.description: Building blockchains doesn't have to be complicated. Develop intuitively with a base layer built for the future.

feature-1.label: Easy to use
feature-1.description: No need to bootstrap your own validator set and easily set up on Sunrise.

feature-2.label: Scalable
feature-2.description: Developers focus on their goals without thinking of infrastructure.

feature-3.label: Flexible
feature-3.description: Sunrise supports any blockchain execution environment, enabling devs to innovate.

feature-4.label: Any tokens as Gas fees
feature-4.description: Sunrise enables projects to pay any tokens as gas fees for using Sunrise.

feature-5.label: Sovereign Proof of Liquidity
feature-5.description: Projects can incentivize both those who participated in governance and who provided liquidity for the tokens.

sunrise-products.label: What you can build with Sunrise
sunrise-products.description: Sunrise is the comprehensive solution to problems faced in modern blockchain development.

product-validiums.label: Optimium / Validium
product-validiums.description: A type of zero-knowledge rollup that posts its data off-chain rather than to its parent chain. The off-chain environment that data is posted to a separate chain, such as Sunrise. They save up to 90% of gas fees when compared to rollups that post data directly to Ethereum and they can pay any tokens as gas fees for AltDA.

product-rollups.label: Sovereign Rollups
product-rollups.description: A sovereign rollup is a type of blockchain that publishes its transactions to another blockchain, typically for ordering and data availability, but handles its own settlement. sovereign rollups are responsible for execution and settlement, while the DA layer handles consensus and data availability.

product-pol.label: Sovereign Proof of Liquidity
product-pol.description: The AMM LP share of the LST of Sunrise and the Sovereign Rollup’s native tokens will be the voting power of the Sovereign Rollup. In other words, LP rewards and Proof of Stake rewards are given to users for LPing and improved security. (e.g. GLU/stSR)

sunrise-mission.label: Mission
sunrise-mission.description: Realizing the next generation of web applications by enhancing liquidity and sovereignty for developers.
